summary: Re-balances combat skill. Heavy armor, Two handed
descriptionHtml:
[center]IMO the two handed skill tree is a little underpowed. This small mod aims to alter this and make a small adjustment to the Heavy armor & Two Handed skill tree.

[u][b][color=yellow]Two Handed[/color][/b][/u]

[b][color=yellow]Barbarian Level 1:[/color][/b] Damage x1.33, Power attack damge x1.1 (Damage was x1.20)
[b][color=yellow]Barbarian Level 2:[/color][/b] Damage x1.66, Power attack damge x1.2 (Damage was x1.40)
[b][color=yellow]Barbarian Level 3:[/color][/b] Damage x1.99(x2.00), Power attack damge x1.3 (Damage was x1.60)
[b][color=yellow]Barbarian Level 4:[/color][/b] Damage x2.50, Power attack damge x1.4 (Damage was x1.80)
[b][color=yellow]Barbarian Level 5:[/color][/b] Damage x3.00, Power attack damge x1.5 (Damage was x2.00)

[color=yellow]Champion\'s Stance:[/color] Power attacks with two-handed weapons cost 50% less stamina(was 25% less).
Blocking with a two handed weapon now blocks 60% more incoming damage.

[u][b][color=lightblue]Heavy Armor[/color][/b][/u]

[b][color=lightblue]Juggernaut Level 1:[/color][/b]Increases armor rating for Heavy Armor by 20%. Health regenerates 20% faster.
[b][color=lightblue]Juggernaut Level 2:[/color][/b]Increases armor rating for Heavy Armor by 40%. Health regenerates 40% faster.
[b][color=lightblue]Juggernaut Level 3:[/color][/b]Increases armor rating for Heavy Armor by 60%. Health regenerates 60% faster.
[b][color=lightblue]Juggernaut Level 4:[/color][/b]Increases armor rating for Heavy Armor by 80%. Health regenerates 80% faster.
[b][color=lightblue]Juggernaut Level 5:[/color][/b]Increases armor rating for Heavy Armor by 100%. Health regenerates 100% faster.


[color=orange]I will be updating this mod with different skills and skill trees.
If there is not a mod that changes the perk that you want different, msg me and i will make that change for you in the form of a new mod.
[/color][/center]
author: byr0nx
